item.title: IPv6 DS-Lite
item.description: IPv6 DS-Lite 기술은 가입자에게 공인 IPv4를 할당하지 않고 IPv4를 사용하는 원격지에 연결할 수 있게 하는 기술

item.title: IPv6 PD
item.description: The Prefix Delegation options provide a mechanism for automated delegation of IPv6 prefixes using the Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol (DHCP).

item.title: TAP Device
item.description: In computer networking, TUN and TAP are kernel virtual network devices. Being network devices supported entirely in software, they differ from ordinary network devices which are backed by physical network adapters.

sequenceDiagram PC ->>+ CPE: Src IPv4 192.168.0.10<br>Dst IPv4 4.3.2.1<br>HTTP Request CPE ->>+ CGN: Src IPv6 3FFE:FFFF:0:2::2<br>Dst IPv6 3FFE:FFFF:50:50::10<br>Src IPv4 192.168.0.10<br>Dst IPv4 4.3.2.1<br>HTTP Request CGN ->>+ 4.3.2.1: Src IPv4 123.123.123.123(NAT)<br>Dst IPv4 4.3.2.1<br>HTTP Request 4.3.2.1 ->>- CGN: Src IPv4 4.3.2.1<br>Dst IPv4 123.123.123.123(NAT)<br>HTTP Response CGN ->>- CPE: Src IPv6 3FFE:FFFF:50:50::10<br>Dst IPv6 3FFE:FFFF:0:2::2<br>Src IPv4 4.3.2.1<br>Dst IPv4 192.168.0.10<br>HTTP Response CPE ->>- PC: Src IPv4 4.3.2.1<br>Dst IPv4 192.168.0.10<br>HTTP Response
